p.s: In this comment I'm going to say my opinion to the quote of Ludwig Wittgenstein.
The quote is the limits of my language are the limits of my world.
I think I can agree to his quote because I think it is true what he said, when you go in a new country where you have to learn a new language.
You can only be a part of the society there when you can speak the language.
Imagine you going from Germany to the USA you have to learn englishEnglish or you have to improve it.
You can only to the things that are that huge then your words horizont.
When you don't learn a language then you are going to live in a parallel society, and you can't discover the diversity of the whole world.
So all in all I can agree to Ludwig Wittgenstein.
